thread.title: Best Mid Town NYC hotel to stay
thread.title_full: Best Mid Town NYC hotel to stay - Review of Radisson Martinique on Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Iyss
title: Best Mid Town NYC hotel to stay
text: Great Location ! close to any place you'll plan to visit !!! Broadway shows, concerts, NYC attractions & shopping - All are around ! Subway is on the next corner :) Great and helpful Hotel staff !!! The breakfast buffet is very tasty with large good selection! of almost everything ! even with fresh vegetables :) that you won't find in any NYC dinner We found the breakfast buffet Very convenient to open a great day :) The room was very clean with everything we needed ! As a booking.com genuios we got these breakfast buffer for free + 2 more hours on check out !!! We enjoyed it very much ! and would happy to come back :)
